creator: Apprize
descriptionHtml:
Truth or Dare is one of the wildest, most hilarious party games on Earth! Whether you’re at a family gathering or a sleepover with friends, you’ll be able to find a huge range of truths and dares pre-loaded into the app – or create your own!

▸ FOR FRIENDS
We’ve included hundreds of truths and dares for you to enjoy from the moment you download our game. Truth or dare is a classic party game to play with friends. You may learn more about each other than you want to!

--------------------------------------------------
★ TRUTH OR DARE – HIGHLIGHTS ★
--------------------------------------------------
• Play truth or dare with hundreds of preset cards
• Create your own categories and custom truths and dares
• Adapt the game to suit any occasion
• Incredibly easy and fun to play
• Offline functionality to play without wifi
• The ultimate multiplayer game – play with as many people as you want!


▸ HOW TO PLAY
The rules are simple! Each player will take turns to pick up the phone and choose between truth or dare. If the player chooses truth, they must answer the question (truthfully) on the screen. If they choose dare, then they must complete the action on screen. If you refuse, you’ll be called a chicken for the rest of your life.

Do you have a remark, a suggestion or just want to say hello? Send us an email to apprize.dev@gmail.com, we love your opinions!

==============================================
DOWNLOAD TRUTH OR DARE PARTY FOR FREE TODAY!
==============================================
